coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Cybersecurity Solution Demo

coveo:metadata.description:
"I've built a model -- now what?"

Developing a predictive model is only one part of a larger journey. Data scientists have to access and transform data, and engineer features, before exploratory modeling happens. A model doesn't do anything until it's applied to data, productionised and deployed.

?3 Things to Learn About:?

  • How to uplevel your existing analytics stack with a collaborative environment that supports the latest open source languages and libraries.
  • How to get better use of your core data management investments while opening up new supported tools for data science.
  • How to expand data science outside of silo?d environments and enable self-service data science access.
coveo:metadata.title: Part 3: Models in Production: A Look From Beginning to End

coveo:metadata.description: ?Learn how Cloudera Data Science Workbench helps you to accelerate analytics projects from data exploration to production, create a self-service data science platform, and deploy your models faster and share them with other data scientists.
coveo:metadata.title: Building Smarter Investing Strategies with Advanced Analytics and Machine Learning

coveo:metadata.description: Watch an interactive webinar to learn more about: Building scalable real time architectures for managing data from IoT, processing data in real time with components such as Kudu & Spark and customer case studies highlighting real-time IoT use cases.
coveo:metadata.title: Simplifying Real-Time Architectures for IoT with Apache Kudu ?

coveo:metadata.description: Learn about how to deploy community defined open data models to break vendor lock-in and gain complete enterprise visibility, how to open up application flexibility while building on a future proofed architecture, and how to infinitely scale data storage, access, and machine learning.
coveo:metadata.title: Supercharge Splunk with Cloudera

coveo:metadata.description: Cloudera Altus makes it easier for data engineers, ETL developers, and anyone who regularly works with raw data to process that data in the cloud efficiently and cost effectively. In this webinar we introduce our new platform-as-a-service offering and explore challenges associated with data processing in the cloud today, how Altus abstracts cluster overhead to deliver easy, efficient data processing, and unique features and benefits of Cloudera Altus.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Altus: Big Data in the Cloud Made Easy

coveo:metadata.description: The Big Picture webinar series explores how industries define their strategies for understanding their consumers better using data. From issuing better healthcare to smarter product and services recommendations, data is the fueling foundation for success. Cloudera is a modern platform that gives analytic access to users that need to understand their customers across multiple touch points and multiple enterprise systems. Cloudera not only unlocks the promise of true customer 360 but it also leverages advanced capabilities for data science and machine learning. In this webinar, we take a look at how data scientists can leverage Cloudera to identify and predict a common customer loyalty use case in telecommunications. We will explore the data, design our features, and then leverage Apache Spark to help us make some predictions on the accuracy of our finding. All within a secure and collaborative environments utilizing the Cloudera Data Science Workbench.
coveo:metadata.title: The Big Picture: Learned Behaviors in Churn

coveo:metadata.description: With 20?30 billion things connected by 2020, IoT has the potential to be one of the most disruptive technological advances in recent ages. However, without the right data management strategy, investments in IoT can yield limited results. So what are the key drivers and patterns for IoT adoption across industries? What are the Top 5 IoT use cases gaining the most traction today? What are the key considerations for data management for IoT? What happens at the edge and what happens in the cloud?
coveo:metadata.title: Making IoT Real - Maturity, Trends & Real World Use Cases

coveo:metadata.description: IoT is reshaping the manufacturing and industrial processes, effectively changing the paradigm from one of repair and replace to more of predict and prevent. Using data streaming from connected equipment and machinery, organizations can now monitor the health of their assets and effectively predict when and how an asset might fail. However, without the right data management strategy and tools, investments in IoT can yield limited results. Join Cloudera and Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) for a joint webinar to learn more about how organizations are using advanced analytics and machine learning to drive IoT enabled predictive maintenance.
coveo:metadata.title: IoT-Enabled Predictive Maintenance

coveo:metadata.description: One of the primary reasons companies look to the public cloud is because they believe it can reduce their total cost of IT ownership (TCO). But the truth is cloud can often be more expensive than on-prem deployments, and if you?re not careful, the services you run can lead to lock in and limit your flexibility. In this webinar, we provide guidance on total cost of ownership in the cloud. We also cover how and when to use cloud object storage, preemptible instances, and transient clusters. Lastly, we look at how increasingly popular multi-cloud strategies can help you lower costs and risk.
coveo:metadata.title: How to Lower TCO and Avoid Cloud Lock-in

coveo:metadata.description: In today?s fast moving world, the ability to capture and process massive amounts of data and make valuable insights is key to gaining a competitive advantage. For RingCentral, a leader in Unified Communications, this is very true since they work with over 350,000 organizations worldwide. With such scale, it can be difficult to address quality issues when they appear while supporting additional calls.
coveo:metadata.title: Driving Better Products with Customer Intelligence

coveo:metadata.description: Join us for a webinar with Intel's Director of Security & Privacy for Health & Life Sciences, Niara's VP of Product Line Management, and Rocky DeStefano, Cloudera Security SME, as they describe the current threat landscape and security best practices for Health and Life Sciences organizations.
coveo:metadata.title: Protecting Health and Life Science Organizations from Breaches and Ransomware

coveo:metadata.description: Cybersecurity takes more than just technology; it takes a holistic strategy driven by the c-suite that includes managerial, organizational, and other strategic aspects of cybersecurity. In this HBR webinar, learn about cybersecurity strategies c-suite executives are implementing to better protect their organization.
coveo:metadata.title: Cybersecurity for the C-Suite

coveo:metadata.description: 3 Things to Learn About: *how to leverage its unique capabilities to extract more value from your data. *three options for running Cloudera in the cloud - IaaS, PaaS, and SaaS - highlighting key similarities and differences *how you can use cloud object storage to ensure business continuity.
coveo:metadata.title: Part 2: How to Run Your Cloud Right

coveo:metadata.description: Complying with industry regulations is a deep-seated function for financial institutions, but the ever-changing nature and nuanced complexities of these regulations can be a strain on resources. Today?s institutions are turning to big data to dramatically reduce their response time to regulations and free up resources to focus on revenue drivers.
coveo:metadata.title: How Nordea Uses Data to Comply with Financial Regulations

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Video,Analytics,Cloudera Manager,Webinars,HBase,Cloudera Enterprise,Hadoop,Big Data,Kudu,Cloudera Enterprise,Cloudera Data Science Workbench,Machine Learning
coveo:metadata.description:
Deep learning expands boundaries of the possible. Detecting fraud. Predicting claims. Diagnosing cancer. Deep learning solves these problems and many others. However, organizations struggle to make deep learning work. With tools like the Cloudera Data Science Workbench, you can bring deep learning to your data, for new insights and applications. A demonstration of Cloudera Data Science Workbench is included in the webinar.

3 things to learn: Practical ways to move forward with deep learning, deep learning without massive new investments, and how to implement self-service deep learning on demand.
coveo:metadata.title: Deep Learning with Cloudera

coveo:metadata.keywords: Customer Experience Management,Videos,Webinars,Video,Analytics,Customer Insights,Predictive Maintenance,Webinars,Industrial IoT,Internet of Things,Cloudera Enterprise,Smart Cities,Connected Vehicles,Cloudera Data Science Workbench,Machine Learning
coveo:metadata.description: With billions of new devices, IoT is transforming how businesses capitalize on data. Data driven organizations are using IoT as as a means to improve their customer experience, drive operational efficiencies, and enable new business models. However, without the right data management strategy and tools, investments in IoT can yield limited results. Join Cloudera and 451 Research for a joint webinar to learn more about some of the data management best practices and how organizations are using advanced analytics and machine learning to enable IoT use cases.
coveo:metadata.title: IoT - Data Management Trends, Best Practices, & Use Cases
coveo:metadata.useCase: Customer Experience Management|Predictive Maintenance|Industrial IoT|Smart Cities|Connected Vehicles

coveo:metadata.description: For the majority of organisations, the goal of GDPR compliance presents an enterprise-wide business problem ? a massive cross-departmental effort that impacts oversight, technology, processes and people. With a landscape full of siloed, disconnected systems, processes and applications, it is challenging enough to build a complete customer picture, let alone complying with the principles and security concepts the regulation now adds. Yet compliance not only reduces business risk by preventing large fines, it also increases reputation with customers and their level of trust.
coveo:metadata.title: Simplify your response to GDPR

coveo:metadata.description: New research shows that 57% of the buying cycle is completed before a prospect even speaks to a company. Marketers already know this, Ninety-six percent (96%) of organizations believe that email personalization can improve email marketing performance. But where do we get this increasingly personal direction? The answer is likely in your customer data. In order to understand your customer needs contextualized in the moment they feel the need to act you will require a platform that can leverage real-time data. Apache Kudu is a Cloudera component that makes dealing with quickly changing data fast and easy. Companies are leveraging next generation data stores like Kudu to build data applications that deliver smart promotions, real-time offers, and personalized marketing. Join us as we discuss modern approaches to real-time application development and highlight key Cloudera use cases being powered by Cloudera?s operational database.
coveo:metadata.title: The Big Picture: Real-time Data is?Defining Intelligent Offers

coveo:metadata.description: Banks are rich in valuable data and can build and maintain a competitive advantage by identifying and executing on high-value machine learning projects leveraging the rich data available. This webinar will describe use cases fit for big data and machine learning in the banking sector (commercial, consumer, regulatory, and markets) and the impact they can have for your organization.
coveo:metadata.title: Transforming Banking with Big Data and Automated Machine Learning

coveo:metadata.description: Alternative data for capital markets, such as satellite imagery, logistics data, and social media feeds, has been getting a lot of attention recently. Like any trending topic, its uses and benefits can be hyped up a bit but if the right plumbing and creativity is in place, those benefits can be realized.
coveo:metadata.title: Put Alternative Data to Use in Capital Markets

coveo:metadata.description: From compliance, to credit analytics, to customer insights, to fraud detection and prevention, learn how one powerful platform can help your organization derive analytic insights, improve real-time decision making, and deliver a better customer experience.
coveo:metadata.title: Webinar | Modern Data Strategy for Regional and Mid-Size Banks

coveo:metadata.description: How good would your decisions be if you had all the facts, all the data? This goal is more and more a nirvana for organisations as the digital universe continues to grow in size. Data arrives at the speed of real time and from ever more sources both inside and outside the organisation. Fact-based decision-making?let alone the evaluation of what-if scenarios, ideas, and approaches?becomes increasingly impossible. Or does it?
coveo:metadata.title: Webinar | Augmented intelligence for banking and other industries with Simudyne and Cloudera

coveo:metadata.description: For the majority of organizations, the goal of GDPR compliance presents an enterprise-wide business problem ? a massive cross-departmental effort that impacts oversight, technology, processes and people. With a landscape full of siloed, disconnected systems, processes and applications, it is challenging enough to build a complete customer picture, let alone complying with the principles and security concepts the regulation now adds. Yet compliance not only reduces business risk by preventing large fines, it also increases reputation with customers and their level of trust.
coveo:metadata.title: Simplify Your Response to GDPR Webinar

coveo:metadata.description:
Machine learning and analytics applications are exploding in the enterprise; driving use cases for preventative maintenance, delivering new desirable product offers to customers at the right time, and combating insider threats to your business.
But each of these high-value use cases rely on a variety of data analysis capabilities working in concert to combine data from different sources into a single coherent picture. Cloudera SDX delivers a ?shared data experience? that makes applications easier to develop, less expensive to deploy and more consistently secure.
coveo:metadata.title: How to Build Multi-disciplinary Analytics Applications on a Shared Data Platform

coveo:metadata.description: Enterprise data warehouses (EDW) have long been the norm to handle analytic processing, but these systems have been pushed to their limits trying to support more data and increasing usage. These constraints on data flexibility, self-service access, and cost-effective scalability have forced IT teams into a pattern of saying ?no? to new business demands as they focus on containing the costs of existing workloads.
coveo:metadata.title: Break Free of the Analytic Constraints: Seamlessly migrate workloads with Cloudera and MicroStrategy

coveo:metadata.product: Machine Learning|Data Engineering|Cloudera Enterprise|Cloudera Data Science Workbench
coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Video,Healthcare,Analytics,Healthcare Analytics,Machine Learning,Webinars,Healthcare & Life Sciences,Data Engineering,Cloudera Enterprise,Big Data,Cloudera Data Science Workbench,Data Science
coveo:metadata.description:
The global healthcare Natural Language Processing (NLP) market is expected to grow from $1.10 billion in 2015 to $2.67 billion by 2020, according to a report from Markets and Markets. This growth is driven by the need to better understand and manage the health and wellness of patient populations in a changing healthcare landscape. But with 80% of healthcare data in unstructured Big Data, so much insight is trapped in text. How are payers and providers to extract these insights and apply them in statistical and machine learning models?
This Cloudera webinar with Linguamatics explores NLP techniques for data discovery and information extraction to enhance predictive risk models, improve population stratification and automate capture of quality measures.
coveo:metadata.title: Use cases for NLP in Healthcare with Linguamatics

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Video,Analytics,Healthcare Analytics,Predictive Maintenance,Webinars,Industrial IoT,Internet of Things,Cloudera Enterprise,Big Data,Smart Cities,Connected Vehicles
coveo:metadata.description: IoT is here to stay. As more data is processed, analyzed, and managed, IDG Research found that this data is processed in a central information hub, combined with other data, rather than processing it at the edge. Learn how to get the most out of IoT data and how to manage it.
coveo:metadata.title: IDG Webinar: IoT Strategy - Balancing Data between the Edge and Hub
coveo:metadata.useCase: Healthcare Analytics|Predictive Maintenance|Industrial IoT|Smart Cities|Connected Vehicles

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Video,Analytics,Cloud,Predictive Maintenance,Webinars,Industrial IoT,Internet of Things,Cloudera Enterprise,Big Data,Smart Cities,Machine Learning
coveo:metadata.description: Given the speed of change, rapid innovation, and the wide variety of standards and use cases that the Internet of Things (IoT) enables, organizations are increasingly looking at open source architectures for IoT in order to drive innovation and accelerate development. Join Cloudera and Red Hat for a joint webinar to learn more about an end-to-end architecture for IoT based on open source and open standards. In this session we'll showcase an end-to-end architecture for IoT highlighting Eclipse Kura, which is an open source stack for gateways and the edge, and Eclipse Kapua, an open source IoT cloud platform.
coveo:metadata.title: An Open Source Architecture for IoT

coveo:metadata.keywords: Customer Experience Management,Videos,Webinars,Video,Big Data,Customer Insights,Webinars,Machine Learning,Personalized & Relevancy Marketing
coveo:metadata.description: Customer experience is a catalyst in many digital transformation projects. It is why many businesses invest in new technologies and processes to more effectively engage customers, constituents, or employees. The goal of putting digital tools to work in a transformative way is to ensure that data and insights connect people with information and processes that ultimately lead to a better experience for customers. Yet, it demands a modern approach that considers all of the platforms, processes, and data across the customer journey. The goal for many organizations is dynamically maintaining a single source of truth about each customer to drive personalized experiences based on individual preferences and behaviors. However, businesses today have primarily invested in systems of record. While these systems are critical for managing internal operational processes, they are typically not effective for today's pace of business change. Insight-driven experiences require customer intelligence platforms that can finally create a customer 360. The deeper data and improved algorithms now available let users factor in individual affinity, segment, and a myriad of growing data sources. The result is greater relevance and effectiveness to deliver a differentiated experience that in today?s competitive landscape is not a luxury, but a necessity for survival.
coveo:metadata.title: Customer Experience: A Catalyst for Digital Transformation

coveo:metadata.product: Machine Learning|Data Engineering|Cloudera Enterprise|Cloudera Data Science Workbench

coveo:metadata.description: Savvy Leaders of Business Transformation and Competitive Advantage strategies are leveraging Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) to deliver valuable insights and operational intelligence that help them prepare to be digital, understand their customers, and, drive revenue growth in real-time. coveo:metadata.description: Machine learning and artificial intelligence are changing the world. From diagnosing heart disease, detecting fraud, predicting insurance claims, to revolutionizing agriculture. Cloudera Fast Forward Labs helps executives to define an investment strategy in these areas to better their businesses. Researchers introduce innovations in machine learning daily. Technical jargon is opaque. Vendor hype muddies the waters. Industry analysts cover the field, but only at a high level. Let Cloudera Fast Forward Labs accelerate your machine learning journey. Delivering a unique blend of applied research and hands-on explanations that you can apply to your business today.

coveo:metadata.description:
Cloudera empowers cybersecurity innovators to proactively secure the enterprise by accelerating threat detection, investigation, and response through machine learning and complete enterprise visibility. Cloudera?s cybersecurity solution, based on Apache Spot, enables anomaly detection, behavior analytics, and comprehensive access across all enterprise data using an open, scalable platform. But what?s the easiest way to get started?

Join Cloudera, StreamSets, and Arcadia Data as we show you first hand how we have made it easier to get your first use case up and running. During this session you will learn:
  • Signs you need Cloudera?s cybersecurity solution
  • How StreamSets can help increase enterprise visibility
  • Providing your security analyst the right context at the right time with modern visualizations
coveo:metadata.title: Get Started with Cloudera?s Cyber Solution

coveo:metadata.product: Data Engineering|Cloudera Altus|Cloudera Enterprise|Operational DB|Data Warehouse
coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Data Engineering,Video,Cloudera Altus,Cloudera Enterprise,Operational DB,Analytics,Cloud,Data Warehouse,Modernize Architecture,Webinars
coveo:metadata.description:
Over the past decade, big data implementations have been more sophisticated in particular for organizations operationalizing machine learning, analytics and data engineering. The pressures of data-driven cultures, multiple workload applications such as customer care, fraud management and cross-platform marketing are changing the game. Mixing machine learning with business processes and operationalizing analytics with data engineering practices places burdens on IT teams. Making these advanced data environments all work together is an ongoing challenge.
While you can still ?swipe and go? to implement data management environments in the cloud for an easy solution, the easy path is often littered with additional costs, higher overhead in terms of maintenance and synchronization. Data savvy organizations are taking a more measured and coordinated approach to their machine learning, analytics and data engineering infrastructures. These proactive approaches speed adoption among business stakeholders and lower administration and governance issues for technologists.
Join John L Myers, managing research director at leading IT analyst firm Enterprise Management Associates (EMA), and Nik Rouda, director of product marketing at Cloudera, to discover how the world of cloud implementations have changed for the better and the future of an enterprise grade cloud environment for your organization using the right resources.
Attend this webinar to learn about: Drivers for implementing machine learning, analytics and data engineering with a proactive approach Pitfalls associated with ?immediate gratification? implementations How business stakeholders benefit from proactive approaches How proactive implementations improve the workloads of technologists Examples of real world customer implementations
coveo:metadata.title: Strategies for Enterprise-grade Azure-based Analytics

coveo:metadata.product: Data Engineering|Cloudera Enterprise|Cloudera Data Science Workbench

Many business leaders are contemplating whether and/or how to introduce artificial intelligence into their organizations. The challenges of implementing AI are much discussed, but beyond implementation, there is the far more important question: how do we generate competitive advantage from AI?s application?
Join Jacques Bughin, author of the MIT SMR article ?Five Management Strategies for Getting the Most From AI,? as he discusses the work of the McKinsey Global Institute around this question of capitalizing on AI. Using industry examples and findings from the Institute?s research, he?ll offer strategies for how to get the most out of AI?s potential.
coveo:metadata.title: MIT Sloan Webinar: Five strategies for getting the most from AI

coveo:metadata.keywords: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA),Data Engineering,Webinars,Cloudera Data Science Workbench,Fast Forward Labs Research
coveo:metadata.description:
Expectations are changing for and within enterprises. In order to innovate and differentiate, they expect and require ever shorter times to insight into their business. They also require insights that are predictive and prescriptive in nature rather than descriptive. Customers? expectations are changing too. They expect businesses to know them, to know them as individuals, and to provide tailored experiences. Exploding data volumes and the surge of real-time, unstructured sources mean traditional Business Intelligence (BI) and analytics efforts are unable to cope and deliver.
However, plenty of data combined with low cost compute power provide the ideal circumstances for machine learning and artificial intelligence to flourish and meet the changing expectations. More data leads to better models; better models that in turn lead to better business decisions. Data science as a discipline will deliver on this promise yet why do so many organisations struggle to capitalise on the opportunity?
Covering data science from both the business as well as technical perspective, this event will provide you with the complete insight you need to either start or enhance your data science projects.
coveo:metadata.title: Machine Learning & Data Science Essentials

Maschinelles Lernen und Analyseanwendungen explodieren im Unternehmen und ermglichen Anwendungsfllen in Bereichen wie vorbeugende Wartung, Bereitstellung neuer, wnschenswerter Produktangebote fr Kunden zum richtigen Zeitpunkt und Bekmpfung von Insider-Bedrohungen fr Ihr Unternehmen.
Jeder dieser hochwertigen Anwendungsflle beruht jedoch auf einer Vielzahl von Datenanalysefunktionen, die zusammenarbeiten mssen, um Daten aus verschiedenen Quellen zu einem einzigen kohrenten Bild zu kombinieren. Cloudera SDX bietet ein "geteiltes Datenerlebnis" (Shared Data eXperience), das die Entwicklung von Anwendungen erleichtert, die Bereitstellung kostengnstiger macht und die Sicherheit der Datennutzung erhht.
coveo:metadata.title: Multidisziplinre Analyseanwendungen auf einer gemeinsamen Datenplattform erstellen

coveo:metadata.description:
More than any business, telecommunications firms have long been dealing with huge, diverse sets of data. Big Data. Data that is unstructured, unwieldy and disorganised, making it difficult to analyse and costly to manage. Your landscape is fiercely competitive and you instinctively know it's exactly that data that would allow you to be more innovative. Data that would set you apart from the competition. You would like to realise its true potential yet you have concerns around security, RoI or integration with existing data management solutions.
These are the Big Data myths that hold you back.
Thankfully there are those that have gone before you and demonstrate the myths are nothing but fiction. Fraud is significantly reduced, enhanced customer experience drives higher customer lifetime value and RoI between 200 and 250% can be achieved.
coveo:metadata.title: The 5 Biggest Data Myths in Telco: Exposed

coveo:metadata.description:
Enter the next major innovation or service enhancement opportunity for a host of industries Still, to make this a reality, there are several challenges you must be overcome in order to craft high performance models:
Data volume ? organisations must meet not only the requirement to store PBs of image data but also provide the capacity to process the often proprietary formats Image annotation ? detailed annotation of image data is a mammoth effort, demanding thousands of hours Data set management ? teams and departments are unable to quickly pull together the right data sets for their use cases and have no visibility of whether suitable images are available in the wider organisation
coveo:metadata.title: Improving computer vision models at scale

coveo:metadata.description: Machine learning and artificial intelligence are exciting technologies, but success means excitement about business outcomes, not technology. Could success make AI boring? In this session we will cover: 1) Scaling enterprise ML across people, process, strategy, and technology; 2) building and deploying automated, repeatable, and predictable ML models; and 3) a vision for an enterprise AI platform that turns data into predictions, at any scale, anywhere.
coveo:metadata.title: Industrialize AI with Enterprise Scale Machine Learning

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Enterprise Data Hub (EDH),Webinars,Cloudera Enterprise,Big Data,Analytics,Data Warehouse,Webinars
coveo:metadata.description: The modern era of data warehousing has a high emphasis on self-service and global access to data, which raises the questions: How can we optimize workloads originated from self-service applications? How can we maintain data warehouse health as it is leveraged by more diverse analytics? How can we ensure scalability without having to increase IT resources? To enable self service and modernize with confidence, modern tools will be needed to increase visibility into workloads, automate health checks and workload tuning, and introduce self-service troubleshooting to the user community. Follow Bloor Group CEO Eric Kavanagh and Chief Scientist Geoffrey Malafsky in this on-demand webinar discussing the new age of data warehousing.
coveo:metadata.title: Bloor Group: Modernizing the Legacy Data Warehouse With Confidence

coveo:metadata.keywords: Data Engineering,Cloudera Altus,Cloudera Enterprise,Data Warehouse,Machine Learning,Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA),Webinars
coveo:metadata.description:
Faced with challenges around everything from customer engagement to risk management, and cybersecurity to operational excellence, businesses everywhere must become data-driven if they are to remain competitive.
Bypassing many of the cost and organizational bottlenecks associated with implementing new capacity in on-premise data centres, the cloud will play a key role in this.
But becoming data-driven means servicing the requirements of all the stakeholders who work with that data. To avoid creating unsustainable data silos, enterprises require the flexibility to support each stakeholder group in an environment where data, governance and security policies are shared and enforced comprehensively and consistently.
coveo:metadata.title: Harnessing the Cloud for Big Data Insights

coveo:metadata.description:
Thriving with data science and machine learning means not only having the right platforms, tools and skills, but identifying use cases and implementing processes that can deliver repeatable, scalable business value. The challenges are numerous, from selecting data sets and data platforms, to architecting and optimizing data pipelines, and model training and deployment. In response, new solutions have emerged to deliver key capabilities in areas including visualization, self-service and real-time analytics.
Watch this webinar to hear about:
Moving from isolated pockets of success to an enterprise AI factory model where capabilities can be built and deployed consistently and repeatedly.
Scaling enterprise machine learning across multiple dimensions, from strategy and people skills, to corporate compliance and technology platforms, to drive business adoption.
Tapping technology platforms designed to unlock the power of open source for deploying machine learning capabilities with enterprise-grade security, governance and scale.
Use cases and solutions for data science and machine learning spanning multiple industries.
coveo:metadata.title: Expanding Data Science and Machine Learning Capabilities

coveo:metadata.description: Never heard of Cloudera Data Science Workbench (CDSW), or thought you knew all there is to know? The data science tools landscape can be confusing, and when it comes to empowering data scientists with the right tools, one size does not fit all. CDSW delivers self-service data science and data engineering for coding data scientists, including secure access to scale-out processing on CDH, and now, HDP clusters, and access to data stored anywhere. In this webinar we?ll cover everything you need to know about the features and functionality of CDSW for powering enterprise data science from research to production.
coveo:metadata.title: Deep dive demo and what?s new with Cloudera Data Science Workbench

coveo:metadata.description: In this Cloudera webinar featuring guest speaker Carl W. Olofson, Research Vice President, Data Management Software, IDC, learn that since the original data warehouse idea, what?s changed, what?s needed, and what are the business drivers for building a fully digital enterprise, including considerations for security and privacy, definitional metadata, and platform requirements.
coveo:metadata.title: Speed, Flexibility, and Intelligence: Beyond the Traditional Data Warehouse

coveo:metadata.description: In this demo, Jeff Fletcher, Machine Learning Field Engineer at Cloudera, highlights model operations workflows using CDSW and leverages real customer examples. Once models have been developed, trained and deployed, this session dives into model operations including deploying and managing those models in production using CDSW so it can be done consistently, anywhere and efficiently.
coveo:metadata.title: Webinar Series: Using Cloudera Data Science Workbench for ML from Research to Production Part 2 of 3

coveo:metadata.description: In this demo Michael Gregory, Machine Learning Field Engineer at Cloudera, draws upon his work with customers to provide a summary and overview of the development phases of the machine learning workflow in CDSW. He shows: -How CDSW enables the development of enterprise-grade ML applications -How to access data, explore data, prepare and clean the data in CDSW -How to leverage CDSW in the training and modeling phase - giving data scientists self-service access to scale out compute resources and environments they need to tune and track experiments with their models
coveo:metadata.title: Webinar Series: Using Cloudera Data Science Workbench for ML from Research to Production Part 1 of 3

coveo:metadata.description: We hope you?ll join us for a live webinar where we will highlight the success of customers adopting a cloud-first strategy for gaining insight across their organizational data. We will discuss frequent cloud use cases across healthcare as well as benefits for employing blockchain in the cloud.
coveo:metadata.title: Leveraging the cloud for precision medicine and more

coveo:metadata.description: In this demo session Jeff Fletcher, Machine Learning Field Engineer at Cloudera, focuses on using Cloudera Data Science Workbench for application prototyping to demonstrate how your ML models can be implemented in data products or business processes. Examples, from Cloudera customers, will also showcase building explainability into your models for transparency and prescriptive insights for your apps.
coveo:metadata.title: Webinar Series: Using Cloudera Data Science Workbench for ML from Research to Production Part 3 of 3

coveo:metadata.description: Communication Service Providers sit on a goldmine of data, however, they have always struggled to extract meaningful value from it. So how can Telcos accelerate their data journey and drive compelling business impacts?Tune into this webinar to learn more about how some of the leading Telecommunication providers around the globe are using analytics and machine learning as a lever to drive business outcomes. As part of this webinar you can learn more about key data management challenges for Telcos, top use cases and a use case maturity roadmap, and real-world examples and customer case studies. Sponsored by: Intel.
coveo:metadata.title: Data-Driven Transformation for Telcos - Use Cases & Key Examples

coveo:metadata.description:
Enterprises are struggling to see value from their IoT implementations. Some of the key challenges with IoT implementations revolve around a simple task ? getting real-time data from the edge devices. Challenges include network availability, latency, cost of roundtripping between the edge and the enterprise, monitoring etc. Edge Management is the ability to manage and monitor thousands of edge agents that are deployed in or near the edge devices to enable edge data collection, enhance edge processing and streamline management of data from edge to enterprise.
Watch this video to learn how your enterprise can take advantage of edge management in your IoT initiatives. Learn more about Cloudera Edge Management and how you can leverage it for addressing your own IoT challenges.
coveo:metadata.title: Edge Management: Gaining value from IoT

coveo:metadata.description: Experience a demonstration of Cloudera Data Platform (CDP), the industry?s first enterprise data cloud. The new cloud service delivers powerful self-service analytics across hybrid and multi-cloud environments, along with sophisticated and granular security and governance policies that IT and data leaders demand.
coveo:metadata.title: Get an exclusive first look at Cloudera Data Platform

coveo:metadata.keywords: Insurance,Customer Experience Management,Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA),Webinars,DataFlow
coveo:metadata.description:
Discover how AXA Belgium centralized, standardized and improved their data sets in order to achieve data science compatibility, GDPR compliance, centralized data discovery and more. By implementing this solution, AXA Belgium now have the flexibility to implement future innovations, including customer 360 in real time, from 10 different sources.
Watch this video to discover more about AXA Belgium?s tech stack, reasons for implementation, cross-business benefits and next steps.
coveo:metadata.title: How does AXA Belgium replicate its operational data into the data lake?

coveo:metadata.description: Please join Hilary Mason, general manager, Machine Learning, at Cloudera, together with Cloudera Machine Learning product experts for a tour of newly available products and services, including Cloudera Data Science Workbench (CDSW) 1.6, and a preview of upcoming innovations that reflect Cloudera?s ongoing commitment to help customers industrialize AI.
coveo:metadata.title: Introducing Cloudera Data Science Workbench 1.6 and New ML Services

coveo:metadata.keywords: Retail, eCommerce & Consumer Products,Videos,Webinars,IoT Connected Products
coveo:metadata.description: With more than $15 Billion spent on Cloud computing, retailers are increasingly adopting Cloud technologies in order to drive greater agility and compete better. They are re-prioritizing investments in the cloud to handle multi-structured (big) data and real-time (IoT) feeds across the enterprise. -- Sponsored by Intel
coveo:metadata.title: Cloud Computing in Retail: The Why, How, and So What?

coveo:metadata.description: Both before and after the merger, Cloudera has many great capabilities available to assist you in getting the most from your Data Warehouse use cases. This session will demonstrate many capabilities, some only previously available to one distribution, now available to everyone.
coveo:metadata.title: Things We Bet You Didn?t Know Your Cloudera Data Warehouse Can Do!

coveo:metadata.description: Streaming architectures are on the rise and enterprises are struggling to scale up as needed. Apache Kafka has emerged as a winner for now amongst the major stream processing engines. However, Kafka can do wonders for a scalable streaming architecture provided it is set up, configured and implemented appropriately. Listen to one of the original Kafka team members and a leader in this space.
coveo:metadata.title: Kafka Power Chat: Challenges in Streaming Architectures

coveo:metadata.description: Experience the Cloudera Data Warehouse on Cloudera Data Platform (CDP), the industry's first enterprise data cloud. Learn how data-driven businesses enable thousands of new users and hundreds of new use cases with the Cloudera Data Warehouse on CDP. Sponsored by: Intel
coveo:metadata.title: Experience the First Hybrid Multi-Cloud Data Warehouse on CDP

coveo:metadata.description: For enterprise practitioners implementing business-specific capabilities, there is more to gain with a deeper understanding of how these technologies work and the newest, most efficient methods of application. Join the Fast Forward Labs team to hear about the latest advancements, including tips you can use to get a headstart as a hands-on applied ML practitioner.
coveo:metadata.title: Advancing ML with Deep Learning and Transfer Learning

coveo:metadata.description: With the growth of Apache Kafka?s adoption in all major streaming initiatives across large organizations, the operational and visibility challenges associated with Kafka are on the rise as well. Kafka users want better visibility in understanding what is going on in the clusters as well as within the stream flows across producers, topics, brokers, and consumers. With no tools in the market that readily address the challenges of the Kafka Ops teams, the development teams and the security/governance teams, Cloudera Streams Messaging Manager (SMM) comes in as a total game-changer to cure Kafka blindness.
coveo:metadata.title: Kafka Power Chat: Curing Kafka Blindness

coveo:metadata.description: The data warehouse, as you once knew it, is gone. The modern data warehouse addresses challenges that weren?t even imagined when the term came to being. On this Actual Tech webinar recording, you will discover the characteristics that define the modern data warehouse and why these characteristics are critical in your quest to rein in data and turn it into insight.
coveo:metadata.title: Discovering the Five Critical Characteristics of a Modern Data Warehouse

coveo:metadata.description: Existing on-premises data warehouses (and their data services teams) are unable to serve current demands. Increasingly, data warehouse modernization means migrating data environments and applications to the cloud. In this TDWI webinar recording, we explore the benefits of the cloud as a platform for data warehouse modernization.
coveo:metadata.title: The Modern Data Warehouse

coveo:metadata.description: We all know our future for data warehousing is in the cloud. As we start making our way there, we recognize a number of challenges - there is no one cloud that can solve all our needs today, and there is no single step to move everything we have on-premises into the cloud. This DBTA webinar recording explores the hybrid and multi-cloud as it relates to data warehousing and what you can do today with a modern data warehouse to embrace these concepts and succeed.
coveo:metadata.title: The Long Tail of the Hybrid and Multi-Cloud

coveo:metadata.description: Join this session to experience how Cloudera Data Hub on the new Cloudera Data Platform delivers true hybrid cloud data management including workload migration from on-premises to public cloud. You will also hear from the chief innovation officer at Clearsense on the company?s hybrid cloud journey.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Data Hub in action: Move workloads to the cloud with speed, agility, and security

coveo:metadata.product: Cloudera Data Platform (CDP)|Cloudera Enterprise|Hortonworks Data Platform
coveo:metadata.keywords: Cloudera Data Platform (CDP),Cloudera Enterprise,Webinars,Hortonworks Data Platform,Americas
coveo:metadata.description: We are getting close to the launch of Cloudera Data Platform, the industry?s first enterprise data cloud. Find out what to expect from our new public cloud service and when CDP will be available on-premises. We will also cover recent updates and upcoming enhancements to our Enterprise Data Hub and HDP platforms.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Data Platform Roadmap Update

coveo:metadata.description: In this webinar, discover how Cloudera Machine Learning (CML), part of the new Cloudera Data Platform (CDP), brings the agility and economics of cloud to self-service data science on governed business data at scale.
coveo:metadata.title: Enable the AI-first enterprise with Cloudera Machine Learning for Cloudera Data Platform

coveo:metadata.description: Cloudera is excited to announce a brand new innovation that our engineering teams have built for Kafka replication ? Cloudera Streams Replication Manager (SRM). Based on Kafka Mirrormaker 2.0, this solution is a gamechanger for the Kafka operations teams.
coveo:metadata.title: Kafka Power Chat: Simplifying Kafka Replication

coveo:metadata.description: Modern data warehousing provides a wide array of analytics options on huge volumes of data. Deliver high-quality experiences to your growing number of self-service users by properly implementing fundamental building blocks.
coveo:metadata.title: How-Tos For Gurus: Building Blocks for the Modern Data Warehouse

coveo:metadata.description: Hear from Anupam Singh, together with Raman Rajasekhar, as they share their experiences using Cloudera Workload XM to help customers maintain, optimize, and protect their data warehouses.
coveo:metadata.title: How Workload XM Saved My Data Warehouse

coveo:metadata.description: Join us on this webinar to listen to guest speaker Mike Gualtieri, VP, Principal Analyst, Forrester, break down the findings from the study and provide guidance on how your organization can scale up your streaming architecture. Dinesh Chandrasekhar, Head of Product Marketing, Data-in-Motion at Cloudera will also be joining this webinar to analyze the interpretations and moderate the discussion with Mike.
coveo:metadata.title: Forrester Study: Data Stream Processing & Analytics Challenges

coveo:metadata.description: During this roundtable discussion, hear from industry analysts and experts, including Gigaom?s Andrew Brust, about operationalizing and industrializing AI, getting ML into production, moving beyond ML and AI tools and platforms to strategy and best practices, and more.
coveo:metadata.title: Making AI Routine, Repeatable and Reliable

coveo:metadata.description:
Financial services institutions lost over $1.5 trillion in combined revenue to financial crimes in 2018, and this is increasing ever rapidly.
Organizations today need a next-generation financial crimes platform that breaks down traditional silos across AML, fraud, cybersecurity, and surveillance, and leverages the power of analytics and machine learning to effectively simulate, predict, and prevent crimes.
Join Cloudera?s financial services industry experts as they explain how an analytics and machine learning led approach can more effectively fight financial crime.
coveo:metadata.title: Moving Towards the Next Gen Financial Crime Platform

coveo:metadata.description: CDP Data Center is the industry?s most powerful, comprehensive data management and analytics platform for on-premises IT environments. Powered by a 100% open source distribution that combines the best technologies from Cloudera and Hortonworks, CDP provides the foundation for extending your workloads to private cloud.
coveo:metadata.title: Accelerate your time-to-insight with CDP Data Center

coveo:metadata.description: Why is data warehouse modernization such a pressing issue today? 1) Business innovation requires bigger and better data, 2) Legacy warehouse designs need serious updating & 3) Technical users need to rethink their platform choices. In this TDWI webinar recording with a presentation from Cloudera, these drivers & use cases for the modernization of the data warehouse are explored.
coveo:metadata.title: The Modernization of the Data Warehouse: Tackling New Architectures for New Use Cases in Analysis and Operations

coveo:metadata.description: This webinar is essential for stakeholders grappling with how to standardize and scale machine learning production across their business.
coveo:metadata.title: Defining and Standardizing Machine Learning Operations

coveo:metadata.description: We?ve heard it before. A data warehouse is a place for formally-structured, highly-curated data, accommodating recurring business analyses, whereas data lakes are places for ?raw? data, serving analytic workloads, experimental in nature. Since both conventional and experimental analysis is important in this data-driven era, we?re left with separate repositories, siloed data, and bifurcated skill sets. Or are we? Learn the answer on this GigaOM webinar recording.
coveo:metadata.title: Unifying Analytics Across Warehouse, Lake and Into the Cloud

coveo:metadata.description: How do you find out what you didn't know you needed to know? This is the question modern data warehouses are tasked with. Because a modern data warehouse has self-service, advanced analytics, and access to tremendous volumes of data sets, we can answer this question. Using techniques for deep research and discovery, complemented by data science, engineering, and machine learning, we are discovering new patterns, new correlations, and new insights. Learn how on this Quinstreet webinar recording, presented by David Dichmann, Director of Product Marketing, Cloudera Data Warehouse.
coveo:metadata.title: How Can You Get Even More Insight from Your Data Warehouse?

coveo:metadata.description: The ability to effectively use and analyze data is fast becoming the difference between success and failure. And many organizations will build analytics and intelligence systems utilizing their data warehouse as the foundation. However, many existing data warehouses were designed and deployed prior to this need. This IDG webinar recording will examine the drivers for modernization; look at how organizations can enhance current data warehouses; and discuss the need to develop a modern data warehouse strategy to support the next-generation analytics and business intelligence.
coveo:metadata.title: Enhancing Your Data Warehouse to Meet the Demands of Advanced Analytics and BI

coveo:metadata.description: Time series analytics provides game-changing insights for your business, allowing you to forecast and predict the future. Extracting high-quality insight from time series data can be challenging because it is multi-dimensional, complex, huge in scale, and often driven by the Internet of Things (IoT). To do so, it is important to develop an infrastructure with not only enormous storage and computing power, but also sophisticated analytics capabilities. Learn how on this DBTA webinar recording.
coveo:metadata.title: Gain Valuable Insights from Your Complex Data with Time Series Analytics

coveo:metadata.description: According to TDWI surveys, the leading driver for modernizing a data warehouse is to enable business-focused, data-driven use cases that are new to the organization. Hence, the new use cases enabled by a modernized data warehouse can transform a business that needs to become more digital, competitive, agile, analytically driven, and modern in every way. In addition, the value of these business-focused use cases proves that there is indeed an organizational need for data warehouse modernization and a business return on the investment. Watch this TDWI webinar recording to learn about new business-driven use cases that are uniquely supported by a modern data warehouse.
coveo:metadata.title: New Data and New Use Cases Powered by the Modern Data Warehouse

coveo:metadata.description:
Putting machine learning into production in the enterprise is not easy; many organizations are struggling to implement the technology at scale. But it is possible to make the process of building, scaling, and deploying enterprise machine learning solutions repeatable and predictable.
Learn from Tom Davenport, President?s Distinguished Professor of IT and Management, Babson College; Alex Breshears, Product Marketing, Cloudera; and Abbie Lundberg, Business Technology Analyst, Lundberg Media on the specific challenges enterprises face in machine learning, and how they can create an end-to-end machine learning capability.
coveo:metadata.title: MIT SMR Webinar: How to Scale Production Machine Learning in the Enterprise

coveo:metadata.description: Join Informatica and Cloudera to learn more about how some of the leading enterprises around the globe are generating valuable customer insights to drive business growth.
coveo:metadata.title: Building a 360 view of the customer with a modern data platform

coveo:metadata.description:
A recent TDWI survey reveals two trends: 1) roughly a quarter of organizations polled have a data warehouse deployed exclusively on cloud. Another quarter has a hybrid data warehouse that distributes data across data platforms on-premises and cloud & 2) organizations of many sizes and industries continue to modernize their data warehouses, so they can keep pace with evolving data and growing data-driven practices in analytics and self-service.
These two trends intersect, such that data warehouse modernization and cloud adoption often go hand in hand. This is largely because both seek to assure extreme scalability, lower administrative and platform costs, and support new business analytics. In this TDWI webinar recording, both practices are discussed with a focus on coordinating the two.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloud at Scale for Modern Data Warehousing

coveo:metadata.description: Explore Cloudera's machine learning platform for enterprise data science teams. In this session you will learn how to connect to and explore large data sets with Apache Spark using Python and R; optimize Spark configurations for the work required; create a shareable output that can be used to explain the data analysis with tables and graphs.
coveo:metadata.title: Machine Learning Platform Tech Demo: Granular data access, exploration and visualization

coveo:metadata.description: An exclusive look at the product roadmap for Cloudera Data Platform (CDP). CDP is the industry?s first enterprise data cloud, delivering multi-function analytics and comprehensive security, governance, and control across hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Data Platform roadmap update

coveo:metadata.description: Given the explosion, speed, and performance of data stored and processed, queries heavily depend on how the data is modeled. Physical modeling must take into account the multiple storage types and query engines in the ecosystem to select from. In this webinar, we cover the best practices for data modeling in Hadoop.
coveo:metadata.title: How-Tos For Gurus: Data Modeling for Hadoop

coveo:metadata.description: Join this webinar to learn how to build a scalable ML cybersecurity strategy that moves models from the lab and into production to detect risks and threats. We?ll cover how to address challenges related to limited or poor data, how to implement ML models to complement and scale the work your teams are doing, and use cases including edge device connectivity and more.
coveo:metadata.title: How to adopt real-time machine learning in cybersecurity

coveo:metadata.description:
Tune in with technical experts to learn more about Cloudera's machine learning platform for enterprise data science teams. Each session will feature a product overview including a live demo and Q&A for both end-user, data scientists and administrators.
What you'll learn:
? Connect to and explore large data sets with Apache Spark using Python and R ? Optimize Spark configurations for the work required ? Create a shareable output that can be used to explain the data analysis with tables and graphs.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Machine Learning Platform | Session 1

coveo:metadata.description: Financial services institutions lost over $1.5 trillion in combined revenue to financial crimes in 2018, and is accelerating ever rapidly. In this video Dr. Richard Harmon, Cloudera?s industry expert for financial services talks about the key challenges and how integrating data, analytics, and machine learning are transforming the fight against financial crime today.
coveo:metadata.title: Using Data and Analytics to Fight Financial Crime

coveo:metadata.description: It?s clear today that the data warehouse industry is undergoing a major transformation. Every large company is eager to adopt machine learning and AI, but unsure of how to do so. The number and variety of edge applications are absolutely exploding, as the world becomes increasingly connected, and as software powers ever more of our economy and lives. Lastly, but perhaps most importantly, the cloud has become increasingly important to enterprises of all sizes and has set a new bar for ease of use. Outlook Series' Michael Lippis interviews David Dichmann to gain Cloudera's perspective on the Modern Data Warehouse.
coveo:metadata.title: Podcast: Optimize Processes, Consumption and Costs with the Modern Data Warehouse

coveo:metadata.description: Today, modern data warehousing has evolved to meet the intensive demands the newest analytics require to be data-driven. Traditional data warehouse vendors may have maturity in data storage, modeling, and high-performance analysis, yet, these legacy solutions are showing their age, and can no longer cost-effectively meet these new demands. Outlook Series' Michael Lippis interviews David Dichmann and Raman Rajasekhar to gain their perspectives on data warehouse optimization.
coveo:metadata.title: Podcast: Cloudera Data Warehouse Optimization Scales Hundreds of Use Cases, Thousands of Users with Ease

coveo:metadata.description: Many organizations face a two-fold challenge with changing business requirements and massively growing datasets. Before selecting a modern data warehouse solution, organizations should first understand the use cases, potential pitfalls, and what to look for in evaluating the best modern data warehouse solution to meet their specific needs. Watch this Actual Tech webinar recording to learn the top five criteria for evaluating a modern data warehouse.
coveo:metadata.title: Top Five Criteria For Evaluating a Modern Data Warehouse

coveo:metadata.description:
In this session on Data engineering and analytics pipeline automation you?ll learn how-to:
1. Filter and prepare data sets to match the requirements discovered in the previous session. 2. Optimize storage and partitioning for the data sets 3. Automate Data Engineering jobs with CDSW; See example jobs running, Learn how to create complex depended jobs and a quick look at the jobs API
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Machine Learning Platform | Session 2 | Data engineering and analytics pipeline automation

coveo:metadata.description: Cloudera Data Platform (CDP) will support Apache NiFi for its Flow Management capabilities and Apache Kafka for its Streams Messaging capabilities. Both are part of Cloudera DataFlow (CDF), a comprehensive, real-time streaming data platform that ingests, curates, and analyzes data for key insights and immediate actionable intelligence. In addition, centralized management, security and governance controls are integrated with CDP.
coveo:metadata.title: Introducing NiFi and Kafka on Cloudera Data Platform

coveo:metadata.description: Join industry thought-leaders Tony Baer, Principal at dbInsight and Cindy Maike, VP of Industry Solutions at Cloudera as they discuss considerations and practical approaches for guiding a digital transformation journey.
coveo:metadata.title: Considerations for Devising Your Enterprise Cloud Strategy

coveo:metadata.keywords: Videos,Webinars,Analyst Reports,Machine Learning,Webinars,Data Engineering & ETL,Machine Learning,Americas
coveo:metadata.description: In this fireside chat, Cloudera Chief Architect Doug Cutting, Forrester senior analyst Dr. Kjell Carlsson, and Senior Product Manager Alex Breshears tackle these questions; how to hire and retain the right talent, how can businesses develop capabilities to quickly and effectively productionalize ML models, what are the requirements for effectively governing and scaling ML models in production, and what are the best practices for ML operations and governance that will accelerate time to value? They discuss the best practices that enterprises are using to successfully develop and operationalize ML and AI solutions that drive transformational outcomes.
coveo:metadata.title: Operationalizing Enterprise Machine Learning

coveo:metadata.description: Today?s data warehouse looks radically different from where it began over 30 years ago. It now delivers more data-driven decisions and predictions than ever before. New technologies, new techniques, new science, and new business theories drive innovation in the ever-evolving discipline of data warehousing and analytics.
coveo:metadata.title: Modern Data Warehouse Fundamentals

coveo:metadata.description: There is an ever-increasing need for speed in business today. The sooner organizations can deliver valuable insights from enterprise data, the greater the competitive advantage. Do you know how to harness the power of advanced analytics for better decision making?
coveo:metadata.title: How-Tos For Gurus: Analytics at Scale

coveo:metadata.description: The explosive growth in Time Series Data is being driven by advances in sensors, connections, databases, online systems, and analytics tools. Time Series analytics provides business insights that enable firms to forecast and predict the future. Extracting high-quality insight from Time Series data can be challenging because it is multi-dimensional, complex, huge in scale, and often driven by the Internet of Things (IoT). To leverage this asset, it is important to develop infrastructure with not only enormous storage and computing power, but also sophisticated analytics capabilities. Outlook Series' Michael Lippis interviews Eva Nahari to gain Cloudera's perspective on Time Series Analytics.
coveo:metadata.title: Podcast: Time Series Analytics Drives More Granular Visibility of Trends in Data

coveo:metadata.description: This webinar is the first in a recurring quarterly webinar to engage with you, our valued customers to foster deeper partnerships, share customer use cases, offer a preview of product roadmaps, collaborate with you on how to solve your most pressing challenges, and help lay the groundwork for developing a Cloudera user-led customer community in the future.
coveo:metadata.title: Healthcare and Life Sciences Customer Connection

coveo:metadata.description: Join Cloudera?s Chief Customer Officer Anupam Singh and Senior Director of Product Marketing Sushant Rao as they discuss how to develop an enterprise data strategy and the recent Harvard Business Review survey on Critical Success Factors for an enterprise data strategy.
coveo:metadata.title: Critical Success Factors for an Enterprise Data Strategy

coveo:metadata.description:
We?re introducing Cloudera Streaming Analytics (CSA), powered by Apache Flink, as a new product offering within the Cloudera DataFlow (CDF) platform.
Cloudera Streaming Analytics (CSA) provides real-time stateful processing of IoT-scale data streams and complex events for predictive insights and is made available on our innovative Cloudera Data Platform (CDP) Data Center.
coveo:metadata.title: Introducing Cloudera Streaming Analytics

coveo:metadata.description: From fraud and security threat detection to flagging abnormalities in healthcare imaging data, there are countless business applications for automatic identification of abnormal data. This process can be challenging, especially when working with large, complex data. This talk explores deep learning approaches (Sequence models, VAEs, GANs) for anomaly detection, when to use them, performance benchmarks and product possibilities.
coveo:metadata.title: Deep Learning for Anomaly Detection

coveo:metadata.description: Join Quantexa and Cloudera as they demonstrate how they?ve partnered with HSBC, Standard Chartered and other leading financial organizations to leverage the power of data, dynamic entity resolution, and advanced network analytics to solve major financial crime challenges while enhancing customer intelligence and improving business outcomes.
coveo:metadata.title: Next Generation Data and Analytics to Fight Financial Crime

coveo:metadata.description: Often, individual teams within organizations race towards their own point solutions for quick wins, and doing this unknowingly creates silos that limit the sharing of insights across divisions and open the organization up to significant risks from newly created gaps in governance and security. Cloudera Data Platform (CDP) Public Cloud Experiences are designed to help any organization make sense of all their available data, at unprecedented speed and scale, and deliver it to the hands of the users that need it without compromising security, governance or increasing costs.
coveo:metadata.title: Introduction to CDP Public Cloud Experiences - Demo

coveo:metadata.description: Join us virtually, no matter where you are working, to learn more about how we are helping our customers say ?yes? to the future with a cloud-native platform that flexes to meet your needs today and tomorrow.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Data Platform Forum

coveo:metadata.description: In this webinar, we?ll explain how integrated analytics experiences on Cloudera Data Platform (CDP ) can help you: *Connect the dots to efficiently deliver the right data and analytical outputs to the right systems at the right time, to operationalize insight effectively *Quickly stand up a data mart from multiple data sources and analytical workloads *Analyze data and then use machine learning for predictive analytics and streaming natural language processing *Enable a richer, data-driven business understanding of customer experience, what?s driving it, and what to do about it, in real-time.

coveo:metadata.title: Optimizing Multi-function Workloads in Hybrid and Multi-cloud

coveo:metadata.description: Please join Andrew to understand how Cloudera Streaming Analytics provides real-time stateful processing of IOT-scale data streams and complex events for predictive insights.
coveo:metadata.title: Don't Flink. You'll Miss it! - Introducing Cloudera Streaming Analytics

coveo:metadata.description: Join us to discover how Cloudera Streaming Analytics unlocks new business value in data by attending this short webinar. Led by Andrew Psaltis, our streaming expert and Field CTO, Asia Pacific
coveo:metadata.title: Don?t Flink. You'll Miss It! - The Cloudera Business Guide to Streaming Analytics

coveo:metadata.description: In this exclusive webinar for Barclays, Jeff Rothwell, Principal Solutions Engineer at Cloudera, will guide you through the benefits and capabilities of Cloudera Machine Learning. Explore how our platform provides data science teams with fast access to governed data from across the bank while also enabling IT teams to maintain data governance and control costs. Both on-premises and in the public cloud.
coveo:metadata.title: A Brave New World: Machine Learning for the Hybrid Cloud

coveo:metadata.description: Machine learning (ML) techniques like deep learning can deliver transformative business outcomes, yet the black-box nature of these approaches creates barriers of understanding that can slow adoption to a halt. ML model interpretability, or the ability to explain why and how a model makes a prediction, can enable enterprises to quickly understand predictive outcomes and confidently make decisions that optimize for future business results.
coveo:metadata.title: Opening the Machine Learning Black Box: Deploying Interpretable Models to Business Users

coveo:metadata.description: Compelling business needs are driving the adoption of the next-generation stream processing & analytics solutions for real-time insights into day-to-day operations. Apache Flink has emerged as the clear choice for streaming architectures to do low-latency processing of high-volume streaming data. Attend this webinar, led by Dinesh Chandrasekhar and Simon Elliston Ball
coveo:metadata.title: Flink Power Chat 1: An Introduction to Apache Flink

coveo:metadata.keywords: Europe, Middle East, and Africa (EMEA),Videos,Webinars,Video,CDP Private Cloud
coveo:metadata.description: Learn how CDP combines enterprise-grade security and governance, multi-function data analytics and an elastic cloud experience. All in one integrated platform built on the best open source technologies.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Forum Russia 2020

coveo:metadata.description: Gain insight from a survey of executive and front line retail respondents providing a comprehensive view of robotic automation, where it's heading, challenges and recommendations for successful deployment.
coveo:metadata.title: The Real Role of Robotics in Retail

coveo:metadata.description:
Learn how to use Cloudera Machine Learning and/or Cloudera Data Science Workbench for serving ML models and interactive visual applications. You'll learn how to:
  • Deploy models to production using the Models feature
  • Use and optimize Apache Spark for real time models
  • Use the Applications feature to build and deploy interactive visual applications using frameworks including R Shiny and Python Dash
coveo:metadata.title: Deploying ML Models and Interactive Apps

coveo:metadata.description: Join this TDWI Webinar to learn how central IT can develop a positive and effective strategy for cloud data management. We will address how to take advantage of the cloud?s benefits while also tending to enterprise concerns across on-premises and cloud systems, including governance, security, data management, and performance.
coveo:metadata.title: Six Strategies for Enabling Central IT to Deploy Cloud Data Management More Effectively

coveo:metadata.description: Join us for this webinar as we discuss Cloudera Data Platform (CDP) - Public Cloud, which has been built from the ground up to take advantage of the cloud, including object stores and containers.
coveo:metadata.title: Modernize your CDH and HDP Deployment in the Cloud

coveo:metadata.description: The return to work following a major disruption brings about a new set of business and operational dynamics. Organizations must plan for more disruptions and develop plans that maintain the health and well-being of their employees while managing business continuity.
coveo:metadata.title: Path to the New Normal... Return to work with the Health, Safety and Privacy of People at the forefront

coveo:metadata.description: JOIN THIS WEBINAR TO: <li>Learn how CML?s MLOps functionality eliminates the model black box and drives secure, transparent ML workflows from data to experimentation to production at scale. <li>Experience CML?s robust and flexible model monitoring service for both technical metrics (latency, throughput, etc.) and the mathematical/functional monitoring ? including first-class prediction tracking, metric stores, and Python SDK. <li>See how CML?s unique model cataloging and model lineage capabilities eliminate silos and lead to better, faster results.
coveo:metadata.title: Enabling Production ML at Scale: Hands on with MLOps in Cloudera Machine Learning

Attend this webinar, led by Dinesh Chandrasekhar and Simon Elliston Ball, to hear them talk about:
<li>Advanced stream processing concepts in Apache Flink <li>Discussion about other stream processing engines <li>Use case driven comparison of Flink with the other engines
coveo:metadata.title: Flink Power Chat 2: Top 5 Advanced Stream Processing Concepts In Apache Flink

coveo:metadata.description: Join us for this webinar and demo to see how CDP enhances AWS EMR by providing: <li>Operational insights into AWS EMR workloads <li>Secure clusters to offload multi-tenant workloads <li>Improved cost efficiency for multi-stage, secure data sets and workloads
coveo:metadata.title: Optimize AWS EMR with Cloudera Data Platform

coveo:metadata.title: Build a Customer Churn Insights Application With CDP

coveo:metadata.description:
As the entire world is fighting hard to win against an invisible threat, the one thing that has been valuable for every organization and entity that is grappling with this situation is Data.
In this webinar hear from an expert panel including Charles Boicey, Co-founder and CIO at Clearsense, and Cindy Maike, VP of Industry Solutions at Cloudera, as they discuss how real-time access to key data and the resulting insights from such data have been extremely useful for making key decisions. And these data points are streaming in from all types of data sources including IoT sensors.
coveo:metadata.title: DBTA Expert Panel: How IoT & Streaming Analytics Can Save the World

coveo:metadata.description:
Streaming applications or the ability to process large amounts of data in real time is drastically gaining momentum in the IT landscape. More and more companies start developing their own streaming applications using a variety of tools and frameworks. Simple applications are built quickly, but with rising complexity, a lot of architectural questions come up.
Watch this recorded webinar with Robert Neumann from Ultra Tendency and Balazs Gaspar from Cloudera and see, how a Double Lambda Architecture outperforms the availability and robustness of an architecture that stretches components over multiple data centers, and how to build an active-active Double Lambda architecture based on Cloudera and deploy it to multiple data centers, and more.
In this on demand session you will also learn more about an architecture that results in zero downtime and even manages to exceed and beat the overall availability of the customer?s mainframe environment - which no other system has managed to do before!
coveo:metadata.title: High Availability Streaming Across Multiple Data Centers - The Double Lambda Architecture

coveo:metadata.description: Join the webinar to gain insight into: <li>The massive scale of data that is needed to make autonomous vehicles truly autonomous <li>The challenges that exist today in leveraging the entire autonomous driving data loop <li>Solutions that reduce cost, effort, and risk when currently using disparate solutions across the autonomous driving loop
coveo:metadata.title: Winning in autonomous driving with Cloudera Data Platform

coveo:metadata.description: We?ll cover: *when you should think about causality and lessons to apply in your data science practice *the latest research at the intersection of machine learning and causality how causal thinking helps us write models that generalize to new circumstances, including an *example of the causal approach applied to a computer vision problem
coveo:metadata.title: Causality for Machine Learning

coveo:metadata.keywords: Risk Modeling and Analysis,Financial Services,Cloudera Data Platform (CDP),Data Engineering,Webinars,Machine Learning

coveo:metadata.title: A New Approach to Central Counterparty (CCP) Resiliency & Stress Testing

coveo:metadata.title: Flink Power Chat 3: A streaming app developer?s guide to Apache Flink

coveo:metadata.title: Transforming Financial Services to a Customer-centric Business

coveo:metadata.title: Scale Analytics with Confidence in Public Cloud

Download the slides  here.
coveo:metadata.title: Cloudera Virtual Seminar - Banking & Financial Services

coveo:metadata.product: Cloudera Cybersecurity Platform|CDP Private Cloud|Machine Learning
coveo:metadata.keywords: Public Sector,Cloudera Cybersecurity Platform,CDP Private Cloud,Machine Learning
coveo:metadata.description:
Are you looking to improve cyber readiness? See how augmenting your existing cybersecurity solutions with real-time log event triaging and extended context improves cyber detection, response, and compliance. Cloudera?s lead Cyber Security SME explains how Cloudera Data Platform helps you:

  • Prioritize cybersecurity events in real-time
  • Detect advanced persistent threats
  • Reduce false positives
  • Leverage machine learning to assist analysts and threat hunters
coveo:metadata.title: Detect, Respond, Comply: Cybersecurity at Scale

coveo:metadata.description:
IT is no longer relegated to the IT group. Lines of business are building new business applications that can drive their business?s top and/or bottom lines. These applications are increasingly stateless -- meaning that they rely on their underlying operational database to manage their state and work with IT to build, deploy and manage the database infrastructure. The application development lifecycle is accelerating with the broad adoption of cloud and the rise of dbPaaS where the database is fully managed and self-optimizes for the applications. In this session, we will show you how the Cloudera Operational Database offers an accelerated on-ramp to app development by offering a modern multi-model database that eliminates infrastructure management.

During this demo, you will learn how to use the Cloudera Operational Database to:
  • Create a new database & new schema
  • Write your first hello-world application using the database
coveo:metadata.title: Faster Application Development with Cloudera Operational Database (COD)

coveo:metadata.description:
Enterprise data science teams need access to business data and the tools and computing resources required for end-to-end machine learning workflows, while IT and the business need to maintain data governance and control infrastructure costs. Cloudera Machine Learning brings the agility and economics of cloud to self-service machine learning workflows with governed business data and tools that data science teams need, anywhere.

During this demo, you?ll learn how:
  • Administrators can deploy ML workspaces for teams with secure access to data and tools for end-to-end data science workflows
  • Users get on-demand access to auto-scaling, auto-suspending compute resources and their preferred editors, tools and libraries, all within administrative guardrails for security and cost
  • Teams can collaborate to accelerate projects from data engineering and exploration to model training and experiment tracking, to deploying and managing models via interactive apps in production
coveo:metadata.title: Accelerate Enterprise Machine Learning with Cloudera Machine Learning (CML)

In this session, we will show you how Cloudera Data Flow's streaming capabilities help enterprises to build end-to-end data pipelines in multi-cloud environments. You'll see how easy it is to create fully secure NiFi and Kafka clusters and use them to build the backbone for your event-driven applications and data movement needs in the cloud.

With CDP, key business personas within enterprises will have real-time critical data available to them to make the right decisions at the right time.
